about_the_game:
In a fractured parallel universe, you're a warrior destined to restore balance. Two powerful bosses guard the realms, each wielding ancient forces that threaten reality. Battle through surreal landscapes, uncover forgotten secrets, and confront these titans in epic, skill-testing duels.

This Demo Features:

Two Epic Boss Fights: Battle against two uniquely designed bosses, each with their own challenging abilities and fighting styles.

Skill-Based Combat: Master a range of combat mechanics that require precision, strategy, and quick reflexes to overcome tough opponents.

Parallel Universe Setting: Explore a visually striking, alternate universe that blends surreal environments with dynamic, otherworldly elements.

content_descriptors.notes: Relisting street fighting. Blood and bone damage

detailed_description:
In a fractured parallel universe, you're a warrior destined to restore balance. Two powerful bosses guard the realms, each wielding ancient forces that threaten reality. Battle through surreal landscapes, uncover forgotten secrets, and confront these titans in epic, skill-testing duels.

This Demo Features:

Two Epic Boss Fights: Battle against two uniquely designed bosses, each with their own challenging abilities and fighting styles.

Skill-Based Combat: Master a range of combat mechanics that require precision, strategy, and quick reflexes to overcome tough opponents.

Parallel Universe Setting: Explore a visually striking, alternate universe that blends surreal environments with dynamic, otherworldly elements.
name: Jab Juggernauts Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel Core i3-5157U Gen 5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR supported VR devices
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8121U Gen 8, or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3080, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR supported VR devices

short_description: In a broken parallel universe, you must defeat powerful bosses to restore balance. Face epic, skill-testing duels across surreal landscapes and uncover secrets that could save reality.
